entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shift+Enter removes XML comment of property #61291
  • Assertion hit in `SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert` #61284
  • C# Code Generator and Code Analyzer don't Recognize Nested Enum as Belonging to Current Generic Class #61281
    Backlog
  • Quick action "Move contents to namespace..." does not appear when namespace is file-scoped #61280
    Backlog
  • Code Style: use block body for accessors: doesn't format correctly #61279
    Backlog
  • Refactoring: replacing switch statement with switch expression deletes preceding comments #61278
    Backlog
  • VB.NET: No refactoring for standard attribute <NonSerialized> #61277
  • [LSP] Use frozen partial semantics for document pull diagnostics #61275
  • InvalidCastException from embedded language bits #61270
  • Multi-line indenting inside a raw string literal doesn't handle inconsistent whitespace #61269
    17.3
  • "Go To Definition" on re-abstraction doesn't go the re-abstracted member #61268
    17.3
  • Convert to raw string doesn't offer to change semantics if there is only whitespace at the end of the string #61267
  • Please allow [assembly: TypeForwardedTo(typeof(T))] when T is [Obsolete] #61264
  • "Implement interface explicitly" fixer implements conversion operators implicitly #61263
  • AssemblySymbol.CorLibrary invariant could be broken #61262

Closed

  • Add aliases informations to deps.json. #61271
  • [EE] EE not formatting IAsyncEnumerable methods correctly #55606
    17.3
  • Add constructor parameter fails with System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #60816
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove eng/docker/mono.sh script #61292
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make static respect modifier order #61289
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Relax assertion in SyntheticBoundNodeFactory.Convert #61287
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for frozen-partial projects, and have skeleton assemblies work effectively for them #61282
    Area-IDE
  • Use SegmentedHashSet<T> to eliminate LOH allocations in AsyncBatchingWorkQueue #61276
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Support LSP services associated with LSP server instances (with lifetimes that match). #61266
    Area-IDE
  • Update dependency versions for 4.2.0 publishing #61265
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Give a specific message when analyzer references a more-recent compiler version #61261
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #61288
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move off of IOperation in speculation analyzer. #61257
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix a few build and package issues #61273
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use proper variable group for generating insertions #61285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add FixAll in Project and Solution support for AddFileBanner refactoring #61208
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Update FindRefs API to support searching for multiple symbols at the same time. #61248
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix for Issue #55606: [EE] Format IAsyncEnumerable method names correctly. #61211
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, Next
  • Support adding multiple parameters on new lines past the original last parameter #61048
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE, Blocked, Need Design Review
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types binding #60977
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve command-line parsing for linux #60711
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix focus on rename UI opening #60846
    Area-IDE
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
